description: The VARIANT_SYSTEM table contains the external variant identifier and the system that defined it and its version.

columns.name: VARIANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the variant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: VARIANT_SYSTEM_C_NAME
columns.description:
The source system category ID for the external variant identifier.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


ClinVar-V


COSMIC-Smpl


dbSNP


dbVar


COSMIC-Strct


ClinGen Allele Registry


COSMIC-Fusion

columns.name: VARIANT_SYSTEM_VER
columns.description: The version of the external source that defined the external variant identifier.

columns.name: VARIANT_CODE
columns.description: The external variant identifier assigned by the variant source.
